item.title: About me
item.description: I’m an infrastructure engineer at Safespring. I’m also a co-organiser of devopsdays Oslo and Stockholm. Sometimes I go to other conferences. This blog is created with Hugo. I’m using a modified Jane theme.

item.title: New Blog
item.description: My old blog wasn’t updated in a long while, and I have planned to move from Jekyll to Hugo for a long while, so I finally set up everything.. I’m actually not sure where the source for my old blog is, but if I find it, I might republish some stuff. And I have planned to publish more content soon.
